TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITrackingPersonalizable

summary.span: 允许 Web 部件控件跟踪个性化加载和保存过程的特定阶段。

span.span: Allows Web Parts controls to track the specific phases of the personalization load and save process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口允许控件开发人员跟踪个性化设置生命周期，包括加载和保存的个性化设置数据的不同阶段。This interface allows control developers to track different phases of the personalization life cycle, including the loading and saving of personalization data. 在大多数情况下，若要使用此接口您将创建一个自定义或和实现此接口。In most cases, to use this interface you would create a custom or and implement this interface. 此外，需要管理他们自己的更改 （"更新"） 跟踪的控件应实现此接口。Additionally, controls that need to manage their own change ("dirty") tracking should implement this interface. 管理其自己的更改跟踪的控件应返回`true`从属性。Controls that manage their own change tracking should return `true` from the property. 如果`false`返回，则 ASP.NET 负责通过比较的属性信息来确定所做更改加载已保存的属性信息。If `false` is returned, then ASP.NET is responsible for determining changes by comparing the property information loaded with the property information that was saved. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用方法和属性，用于跟踪加载和保存个性化设置信息。The following code example demonstrates using methods and properties to track the loading and saving of personalization information. 该示例包含两个部分、.aspx 页和应该放在 App_Code 子目录中的文件。The example consists of two parts, an .aspx page and a file that should be placed in an App_Code subdirectory. 下面的代码示例创建允许用户输入 URL 的信息，并将保存此信息的用户的 Web 部件控件。The following code example creates a Web Parts control that allows a user to enter URL information and saves this information for the user. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/CS/persdict.cs#9)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/VB/persdict.vb#9)] 以下的.aspx 页面创建 Web 部件区域，并将控件添加到区域。The following .aspx page creates a Web Parts zone and adds the control to the zone. 该页还引用你应使用，以便可以应用个性化设置，每个用户登录的登录控件。The page also references a login control that you should use to log on individual users so that personalization can be applied. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/CS/defaultcs.aspx#10)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/VB/Defaultvb.aspx#10)]

related.span: Web 部件个性化设置概述
演练： 实现使用用户控件的 Web 部件个性化设置

span.span: Walkthrough: Implementing Web Parts Personalization with a User Control

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void BeginLoad() cil managed

summary.span: 表示个性化信息加载阶段开始。

span.span: Represents the beginning of the load phase for personalization information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件控件集调用此方法以应用个性化设置数据。The Web Parts control set calls this method prior to applying personalization data. 跟踪其自己的更改状态的控件应使用此方法设置，该值指示属性不应调用的内部标志。A control that tracks its own change state should use this method to set an internal flag indicating that properties should not call . 这是因为属性设置方法可以调用的个性化设置数据，之后到调用应用程序期间。This is because property-setting methods can be called during the application of personalization data, subsequent to the call to . 在大多数情况下，控件不应将只是因为其可个性化属性已设置基于从基础数据存储区加载数据 （"更新"） 更改。In most scenarios, a control should not be considered changed ("dirty") just because its personalizable properties have been set based on data loaded from the underlying data store. > [!NOTE] > 导入 Web 部件控件后应用个性化设置数据时，还将调用此方法。This method is also called when personalization data is applied after importing a Web Parts control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates using the method. 控件和一个.aspx 页面组成的完整的工作代码示例，请参阅类概述主题。For a complete, working code example that consists of a control and an .aspx page, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/CS/persdict.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/VB/persdict.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void BeginSave() cil managed

summary.span: 表示从控件提取个性化数据之前的阶段。

span.span: Represents the phase prior to extracting personalization data from a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件控件集调用此方法，然后从控件提取个性化设置数据。The Web Parts control set calls this method prior to extracting personalization data from the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates using the method. 控件和一个.aspx 页面组成的完整的工作代码示例，请参阅类概述主题。For a complete, working code example that consists of a control and an .aspx page, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/CS/persdict.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/VB/persdict.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void EndLoad() cil managed

summary.span: 表示已经将个性化数据应用于控件之后的阶段。

span.span: Represents the phase after personalization data has been applied to a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件控件集的调用此方法之后的个性化设置数据已应用到控件。The Web Parts control set calls this method after personalization data has been applied to the control. 跟踪其更改状态的控件应使用此方法重置其内部状态以指示后续属性设置方法应调用。A control that tracks its change state should use this method to reset its internal state to indicate that subsequent property-setting methods should call . 按时间方法调用时，Web 部件控件集已完成的个性化设置数据控件到任何应用程序。By the time the method is called, the Web Parts control set has completed any application of personalization data to the control. 因此，对控件的状态的后续更改应视为有效指示符，该控件已更改 （即"更新"）。As a result, subsequent changes to the control's state should be considered valid indicators that the control has changed (is "dirty"). > [!NOTE] > 导入 Web 部件控件后应用个性化设置数据时，还将调用此方法。This method is also called when personalization data is applied after importing a Web Parts control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates using the method. 控件和一个.aspx 页面组成的完整的工作代码示例，请参阅类概述主题。For a complete, working code example that consists of a control and an .aspx page, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/CS/persdict.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/VB/persdict.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void EndSave() cil managed

summary.span: 表示已经从控件提取个性化数据之后的阶段。

span.span: Represents the phase after personalization data has been extracted from a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件控件集已从控件提取个性化设置数据之后此方法的调用。The Web Parts control set calls this method after personalization data has been extracted from the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates using the method. 控件和一个.aspx 页面组成的完整的工作代码示例，请参阅类概述主题。For a complete, working code example that consists of a control and an .aspx page, see the class overview topic. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TracksChanges As Boolean
public: property bool TracksChanges { bool get(); };

summary.span: 指示控件是否跟踪其更改的状态。

span.span: Indicates whether the control tracks the status of its changes.

value.span: 如果要 Web 部件控件负责确定何时控件被视为已更改（“更新”），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the Web Parts control is responsible for determining when the control is considered changed ("dirty"); otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件返回`true`从此属性，则 Web 部件控件负责确定何时将其视为"脏"。If a control returns `true` from this property, then it is the Web Parts control's responsibility to determine when it considers itself "dirty." 如果控件将确定它已经更改 （即"更新"），控件必须调用本身上。If a control determines that it has changed (is "dirty"), that control must call on itself. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何设置属性。The following code example demonstrates setting the property. 控件和一个.aspx 页面组成的完整的工作代码示例，请参阅类概述主题。For a complete, working code example that consists of a control and an .aspx page, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/CS/persdict.cs#8)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable/VB/persdict.vb#8)]
